items.title: Don’t miss Samsung’s 180MB/s 128GB PRO Plus Sonic the Hedgehog microSD with adapter while it’s just $13 (50% off)
items.summary:
While you can find some solid deals on SSDs, memory cards, and more directly at Samsung, B&H is serving an unmissable offer today that drops the brand’s 128GB PRO Plus Sonic the Hedgehog-branded microSD + adapter combo down to $12.99 shipped with a $9 coupon that auto-applies during checkout. This is originally a $24 unit that has lately been going for $18 at Amazon, so you’re looking at a straight-up 50% markdown on its usual going rate today. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this combo outside a very limited one-time offer that briefly had it for $12 earlier this year. The standard Samsung 128GB PRO Plus microSD card is also at $12.99 shipped today at B&H, so feel free to pick the one you like as they share the same specifications. Head below for more details.

items.title: Govee’s Smart Electric Kettle Pro that sports a tea infuser drops back to $60 (Save $30), more from $29
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering its Smart Electric Kettle Pro with a tea infuser is down at $59.84 shipped. This is the newest of the brand’s smart kettles that starts at a $90 full price and has been seen going as low as $59 in 2025. Aside from the one-time fall to $58 we spotted back in 2024, as well as the short-lived Prime exclusive fall to $59 in early October 2025, you’re otherwise getting the best price we have tracked, courtesy of the $30 markdown here, returning it to its Black Friday pricing. Below, we’ve also collected a bunch of other smart appliances from this brand at discounted rates.

items.title: Bring 8-in-1 versatility to home renovations, jobsites, more with Worx Aerocart back at its $160 annual low (Save $70)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering the best return price of the year on the popular Worx Aerocart 8-in-1 Yard Cart at $159.99 shipped, which we’re seeing match as one of Best Buy’s Deals of the Day, meaning the discount may end along with it at midnight PST. While it carries a $260 MSRP directly from the brand, you’ll more often find it at Amazon either starting at $230, or discounted between $190 and $169, with recent Black Friday sales only bringing the costs down to $170. Today’s deal comes in even lower as the 30% markdown cuts $70 off the going rate for a return landing at the year’s best tracked price, which was last seen in March.

items.title: Several Anker eufy solar cameras, smart locks, more are seeing up to 50% savings back to lows from $50
items.summary:
Through Anker’s official eufy Amazon storefront, we’re seeing the brand offer several of its smart home security devices back at Black Friday rates or the next-best prices. One such model heading back to its best pricing is the popular Anker eufy SoloCam S220 Wireless Solar Security Camera starting at $49.99 shipped, while its 4-camera bundle is back at $179.99 shipped. These two bundles usually fetch full $100 or $280 prices, with the deals here having first been spotted during Amazon’s full Black Friday sale event. You’re getting 50% and 36% markdowns for the second time here while the deals last, cutting $50 and $100 off the going rates to land them back at their all-time lowest prices. Head below to browse the rest of the lineup of security device deals we’re seeing right now.
